casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Noui PHACHOUMPHONE No. 65PA18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 William D. Spence, Attorney at Law, Kinston, for Phachoumphone, Noui. M. Elizabeth Guzman, Assistant Attorney General, Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. M. Elizabeth Guzman, Assistant Attorney General.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th of March 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
